# Project plan

## Start-up phase

October 2020 - December 2020: 

* Invite new team members 
* Team orientation for all members
* First series of webinars under funding

January 2021 - June 2021 

* Regular meetings with R consortium representatives to monitor progress and discuss list of invited speakers
* Remainder of webinars under funding
